member.name: T:System.IO.FileSystemInfo
member.summary: Provides the base class for both and objects.

member.name: M:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The specified is null.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Attributes
member.summary: Gets or sets the current directory or file.
member.exception: The specified file does not exist.
The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
The caller does not have the required permission.
The caller attempts to set an invalid file attribute.
cannot initialize the data.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the creation time of the current directory or file.
member.returns: The creation date and time of the current object.
member.exception: cannot initialize the data.
The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the creation time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), of the current directory or file.
member.returns: The creation date and time in UTC format of the current object.
member.exception: cannot initialize the data.
The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.

member.name: M:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Delete
member.exception: The specified path is invalid; for example, it is on an unmapped drive.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Exists
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the file or directory exists.
member.returns: true if the file or directory exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Extension
member.summary: Gets the string representing the extension part of the file.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.FullName
member.summary: Gets the full path of the directory or file.
member.returns: A string containing the full path.
member.exception: The fully qualified path and file name is 260 or more characters.
The caller does not have the required permission.

member.name: F:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.FullPath
member.summary: Represents the fully qualified path of the directory or file.
member.exception: The fully qualified path is 260 or more characters.

member.name: M:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Sets the object with the file name and additional exception information.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time the current file or directory was last accessed.
member.returns: The time that the current file or directory was last accessed.
member.exception: cannot initialize the data.
The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), that the current file or directory was last accessed.
member.returns: The UTC time that the current file or directory was last accessed.
member.exception: cannot initialize the data.
The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time when the current file or directory was last written to.
member.returns: The time the current file was last written.
member.exception: cannot initialize the data.
The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastWriteTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), when the current file or directory was last written to.
member.returns: The UTC time when the current file was last written to.
member.exception: cannot initialize the data.
The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.

member.name: P:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Name
member.summary: For files, gets the name of the file. For directories, gets the name of the last directory in the hierarchy if a hierarchy exists. Otherwise, the Name property gets the name of the directory.
member.returns: A string that is the name of the parent directory, the name of the last directory in the hierarchy, or the name of a file, including the file name extension.

member.name: F:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.OriginalPath
member.summary: The path originally specified by the user, whether relative or absolute.

member.name: M:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the state of the object.
member.exception: A device such as a disk drive is not ready.
